name: Icon Master
description:
Why Icon Master?

While working with icons, the most annoying thing is different sizes of icons. It becomes more painful, when we have to use icons from third party library. Then resizing icons and creating icon components become a hard task. Here Icon Master comes to assist us.


Features

  • We can resize icons
  • We can add containers around icons
  • Icon will be automatically converted into components
  • We can change colors of the new icons
  • Many more useful features are coming...


How to use?

It's as simple as a snap. What you have to do is:

  • Just select one or more frames or vector nodes
  • Run the Icon Master plugin
  • Provide expected container and icon sizes as well as color of icon
  • And Boom... (Click the boom button)
  • A new frame with new icons will be generated


Your help needed

This plugin may have several errors or lack of features. In that case we need your help.

If you face any issue, please, kindly report that in the comment section.

Also if you have any feature request, please, tell us more about it. We'll definitely try to implement (if the feature is useful).


You can meet me here: https://www.showrin.com/
